reviewText: Shannon is well portrayed as a twin; I do not understand why people think she can't act. Well, she can. It's good.

This is a very well written, well acted video.  It is well worth the

This must be one of the best of its kind.  The softcore/thriller genre or whatever.  All I can remember about the plot (like it matters) is that Whirry plays twins which means there's double the nudity.  The unrated version of this film is like a practice in seeing how much nudity and sex can be put in a movie like this.  Someone stole the copy that my local video store carried (I wonder why).  That's how good it is, folks.  Mirror Images 2 must be worth I don't know how many Shannon Tweed movies. However, it seems to be hard to find at the moment and I can't recommend paying an out of print price for a VHS copy.  Seek out rentals and check for a DVD first.
